data.title: Population of Malawi
meta_keywords: Malawi statistics population capital currency density urbanization ratio median age male female life expectancy
data.meta_description: Malawi - UN member since 1 December 1964. The capital of Malawi is Lilongwe , the currency is Kwacha. 20% of population live in urban areas. Total median age is 17.2 years. Life expectancy at birth for total population is 51.7 years.
data.text:
Total population 2011 est.15 879 252 persons&nbsp&nbsp Male population 2011 est.7 909 874 persons&nbsp&nbsp Female population 2011 est.7 969 378 personsDensity of population 2011 est.134.0 persons per km2Sex ratio of total population 2012 est.0.993 male/female&nbsp&nbsp Sex ratio at birth 2012 est.1.015 male/female&nbsp&nbsp Sex ratio of under 15 years old population 2012 est.1.004 male/female&nbsp&nbsp Sex ratio of 15-64 years old population 2012 est.0.997 male/female&nbsp&nbsp Sex ratio of 65 years and over population 2012 est.0.750 male/femalePopulation in urban areas 201020.0 % of total population&nbsp&nbsp Rate of urbanization 2010-15 est.5.3 % per yearPopulation in rural areas 201080.0 % of total populationPopulation under 15 years old 2012 est.45.1 % of total population&nbsp&nbsp Male population under 15 years old 2012 est.45.3 % of male population&nbsp&nbsp Female population under 15 years old 2012 est.44.8 % of female populationPopulation 15-64 years old 2012 est.52.2 % of total population&nbsp&nbsp Male population 15-64 years old 2012 est.52.4 % of male population&nbsp&nbsp Female population 15-64 years old 2012 est.52.1 % of female populationPopulation 65 years and over 2012 est.2.7 % of total population&nbsp&nbsp Male population 65 years and over 2012 est.2.3 % of male population&nbsp&nbsp Female population 65 years and over 2012 est.3.1 % of female populationTotal median age Median age is the age that divides a population into two numerically equal groups; that is, half the people are younger than this age and half are older.2012 est.17.2 years&nbsp&nbsp Male median age 2012 est.17.1 years&nbsp&nbsp Female median age 2012 est.17.4 yearsLife expectancy at birth,total Life expectancy at birth shows the average number of years to be lived by a group of people born in the same year, if mortality at each age remains constant in the future.2011 est.51.7 years&nbsp&nbsp Life expectancy at birth, male population 2011 est.50.9 years
